text: Hambran is a village located in the Ludhiana West tehsil, of Ludhiana district, Punjab. Hambran is a township in Punjab state in India. Located in the Ludhiana District close to Mullanpur Dakha, 17 Km ( 10 miles ) west of Ludhiana. In 2019 Panchayat Polling that the S.Ranjodh Singh alias jagga is elected as sarpanch of Hambran. ==Administration== The village is administrated by a Sarpanch Ranjodh Singh Jagga who is an elected representative of village as per constitution of India and Panchayati raj (India). {|class="wikitable sortable" ! Particulars !! Total !!
